name: structGet
description: Gets a structure(s) from a specified path.

params.name: pathdesired
params.description: Pathname of variable that contains structure or array from which CFML retrieves the value. If there is no structure or array present in the path, this function creates structures or arrays to make it a valid variable path.

examples.title: Get a value in a structure using structGet
Accidentially Modifying a Structure
examples.description: The structGet function will create structures to complete the path.
